exercises.title: Barbell Squat
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the lower body. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, barbell across upper back. Lower your body until thighs are parallel to ground, then push back up.
exercises.tips: Keep chest up, core tight, and knees tracking over toes

exercises.title: Bench Press
exercises.description: Classic chest exercise. Lie on bench, grip barbell slightly wider than shoulders. Lower bar to chest, then press up with controlled movement.
exercises.tips: Keep wrists straight and elbows at 45-degree angle

exercises.title: Deadlift
exercises.description: Full-body compound movement. Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip barbell with hands outside knees. Hinge at hips to lift bar, keeping back straight.
exercises.tips: Start with lighter weight to perfect form. Keep bar close to shins and thighs throughout movement
